summary: A chronicle of the former president's tour recent for his book "Palestine: Peace Not Apartheid."
cast: Lillian Carter|Jimmy Carter|Rosalynn Carter|Elizabeth Hayes|Terry Gross|Carolyn Cole|Josh Getlin|Jane Ammeson|David Rosenthal|Carolyn Reidy|Charlie Rose|Diane Rehm|Wolf Blitzer|Laura Ertmer|Remington Byer|Reda Mansour|Robbie Brown|Elisa Shokoff|Anwar Sadat|Menachem Begin|Amy Carter|Tavis Smiley|Holly Williamson|Sheila Evers|Jay Leno|Panic! at the Disco|Edward Norton|Yaron Deckel|Riz Khan|Thomas Schaefer|Kasey Kaufman|Alan Dershowitz|Johnny Carson|Steve Cochran|Jonathan Demme|Larry King
title: Jimmy Carter Man from Plains
